According to CEO Sergio Marchionne , the improvement was achieved primarily through improving manufacturing efficiency, increasing attention to product quality, and pushing new products to market. As Chrysler Group's brand displays at the Detroit Auto Show confirmed, the company has lived up to its promise to launch 16 all-new or significantly refreshed vehicles in the past 12 months, Sergio Marchionne said in a prepared statement. Hillary Clinton Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.), who recently took over Hillary Clinton 's former seat on the Senate Armed Services Committee, also worried today about decreased funding of the Marines: The Marine Corps must have the resources it needs to respond to new and emerging cyber threats and terror threats in different parts of the world. Secretary Robert Gates will explain his vision to the committee next week, and I look forward to working with him to ensure the Marine Corps is well-positioned to respond to the new security demands that will continue to emerge, Kirsten Gillibrand said in a statement.
